steps.value: Given I am on main application page
When I change window size to `${resolution}`
When I save `content` attribute value of element located `elementName(version):a` to ((story)) variable `ui-version`

scenarios.title: check empty pages

steps: When I go to relative URL `<relative-url>`
When I change context to element located by `<locator>`

When the condition `#{eval("<relative-url>"=="/library")}` is true I do
|step                                                                                  |
|When I click on element located by `buttonName(Upload)`                               |
|Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is equal to `/new-case/upload-video`|

steps.value: When I go to relative URL `((/insights/no-cases-found))`
When I change context to element located by `((xpath(//*[@data-test-id='jnj-empty-state-component']/..)))`
When I ((${visual-action})) baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-((insights))-empty`

When the condition `#{eval("((/insights/no-cases-found))"=="/library")}` is true I do
|step                                                                                  |
|When I click on element located by `buttonName(Upload)`                               |
|Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is equal to `/new-case/upload-video`|
When I go to relative URL `((/insights/procedure-no-cases-found))`
When I change context to element located by `((xpath(//*[@data-test-id='jnj-empty-state-component']/../..)))`
When I ((${visual-action})) baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-((insights-procedure))-empty`

When the condition `#{eval("((/insights/procedure-no-cases-found))"=="/library")}` is true I do
|step                                                                                  |
|When I click on element located by `buttonName(Upload)`                               |
|Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is equal to `/new-case/upload-video`|
When I go to relative URL `((/library))`
When I change context to element located by `((xpath(//*[@data-test-id='jnj-no-videos-found']/..)))`
When I ((${visual-action})) baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-((library))-empty`

When the condition `#{eval("((/library))"=="/library")}` is true I do
|step                                                                                  |
|When I click on element located by `buttonName(Upload)`                               |
|Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is equal to `/new-case/upload-video`|
When I go to relative URL `((/library/bookmarked))`
When I change context to element located by `((xpath(//*[@data-test-id='jnj-no-videos-found']/..)))`
When I ((${visual-action})) baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-((library-bookmarked))-empty`

When the condition `#{eval("((/library/bookmarked))"=="/library")}` is true I do
|step                                                                                  |
|When I click on element located by `buttonName(Upload)`                               |
|Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is equal to `/new-case/upload-video`|
When I go to relative URL `((/my-cases?search=shared))`
When I change context to element located by `((xpath(//*[@data-test-id='jnj-empty-state-component']/../..)))`
When I ((${visual-action})) baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-((my-cases-shared))-empty`

When the condition `#{eval("((/my-cases?search=shared))"=="/library")}` is true I do
|step                                                                                  |
|When I click on element located by `buttonName(Upload)`                               |
|Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is equal to `/new-case/upload-video`|
